a correspond between algol 60 and church s lambda notatpart i thi paper describ how some of the semantof algol 60 can be formal by establish a correspondbetween express of algol 60 and express in a modifiform of church s l notat first a model forcomput languag and comput behavior is describ base on thenotion of function applic and function abstract but also haveanalogu for imper languag featur then thi model is usas an abstract object languag into which algol 60 ismap mani of algol 60 s featur emerg as particulararrang of a small number of structur rule suggest newclassif and gener the correspond is first describ inform mainliby illustr the second part of the paper give aformal descript i e an abstract compil into the abstractobjct languag thi is itself present in a pure
